abstract: New internal documents from Bank of America suggest that bank officials may have told the federal officials of their plans to exercise an escape hatch in their deal for Merrill Lynch as part of a high-stakes negotiating strategy to arrange a second bailout from the government.

lead_paragraph: From Eric Dash, a DealBook colleague:

headline.main: Bank of America E-Mails Shed Light on Merrill Deal
